body: The Bangladesh government has decided to remove beggars and hawkers from major streets of Dhaka city  in preparation for the ICC Cricket World Cup. Rahnuma Ahmed reports that the police in Bangladesh is breaking the law to implement this directive.
original_body: The Bangladesh government has decided to remove beggars and hawkers from major streets of Dhaka city in preparation for the ICC Cricket World Cup. Rahnuma Ahmed reports that the police in Bangladesh is breaking the law to implement this directive.
title: Bangladesh: World Cup Makeover Breaks The Law

sentence: The Bangladesh government has decided to remove beggars and hawkers from major streets of Dhaka city  in preparation for the ICC Cricket World Cup.
Rahnuma Ahmed reports that the police in Bangladesh is breaking the law to implement this directive.
